metadata.title: CVE-2017-15047 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The clusterLoadConfig function in cluster.c in Redis 4.0.2 allows attackersto cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds array index and applicationcrash) or possibly have unspecified other impact by leveraging "limitedaccess to the machine."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15047` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

redis - 5:4.0.9-1
redis-sentinel - 5:4.0.9-1
redis-server - 5:4.0.9-1
redis-tools - 5:4.0.9-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redis package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5:4.0.9-1').
